entry.title: SPECIAL: GPT-X, Diffusion, and our Multimodal Future Part II (DALL-E in the future)

media:group.media:title: SPECIAL: GPT-X, Diffusion, and our Multimodal Future Part II (DALL-E in the future)
media:group.media:description:
What could an AI creative tool like DALL-E 2 or Midjourney look like in the next few years? This video explores the full set of future possibilities upon us!
GPT-X, Diffusion, and our Multimodal Future (Part II) BOOK: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TeRMqOsGX8kiK_mNiCt4yxO26Yjk6BdM/
Timestamps: 00:00 - Intro 05:02 - Multimodal Model Characteristics 11:26 - Creating a new image 15:56 - Prompt writing capabilities - Prompt Formatting 16:50 - Prompt autocompletion, intelligent suggestions 19:57 - Built in prompt unbundling 21:57 - Configure Recombinants 23:45 - Recombinant blending modes 25:07 - Configure Recombinant Unbundling Details 26:12 - Recombinant Layers & Node based 28:05 - Recombinant Import Bench 29:48 - Natural Language Image editing - refresh individual objects 31:44 - Edit mode - Natural Langauge Edit Prompts 32:37 - Edit prompt realtime feedback 33:05 - Natural language hex color editing support 34:35 - Advanced Natural Language Edit Prompt Changes 35:53 - Edit prompt intensity (UI controls) 36:59 - Multimodal Object Transformations 37:16 - Lighting & Camera Controls 38:00 - Advanced Editing Tools (Fix AI Weirdness and more) 39:27 - Edit images via markup (markup prompt) 40:43 - Logical Variations 43:57 - Realtime Collaboration 44:28 - Recombinant Collaborators 46:06 - Built in Music Player 48:45 - Creative Hyperparameters 49:20 - Text Capabilities - Magic Text 50:52 - Text Capabilities - Magic Text Fill 52:41 - Latent Variation Scrubbing 53:34 - Explore Alternatives 56:34 - Productivity and commercialization 58:06 - Analysis & Feedback 59:16 - Advanced Multimodal Capabilities 1:03:45 - Offline Capabilities 1:11:11 - Advanced Workflow Support 1:11:58 - Closing thoughts
GPT-X, DALL-E, and our Multimodal Future (Part I) https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLza3gaByGSXjUCtIuv2x9fwkx3K_3CDmw
Links: DALL-E 2 unbundling https://bakztfuture.substack.com/p/dall-e-2-unbundling DALL-E 2: Recombinant Art & Design https://bakztfuture.substack.com/p/dall-e-2-recombinant-art-and-design DALL-E 2 - Unofficial Natural Language Image Editing, Art Critique Survey https://bakztfuture.substack.com/p/dall-e-2-unofficial-natural-language-b14
Please note I do not represent, have any affiliation with, nor do I speak on behalf of OpenAI.

entry.title: #36 - SPECIAL: DALL-E 2 Pricing Breakdown, Announcement Reaction, Commercialization, and more!

media:group.media:title: #36 - SPECIAL: DALL-E 2 Pricing Breakdown, Announcement Reaction, Commercialization, and more!
media:group.media:description:
Welcome back to Multimodal! This episode, we are discussing OpenAI's latest announcement - DALL-E 2 is entering the beta stage and we now have pricing details for DALL-E as well! I'm going to be discussing my thoughts on this announcement and what it means for the future of the DALL-E 2 product and community.
Show Notes/Links DALL-E 2 Pricing Announcement: https://openai.com/blog/dall-e-now-available-in-beta/
Timestamps 00:00 - Introduction 02:51 - OpenAI DALL-E 2 Announcement Breakdown 06:12 - DALL-E 2 Flow State 12:12 - OpenAI Pricing Rollout 13:00 - Why I'm Reversing my DALL-E 2 Valuation 15:08 - Credits based pricing 15:40 - Is DALL-E 2 a stock photography site (?) 18:17 - Prediction: DALL-E 2 Churn Rate/Retention for Users 19:43 - GPT-3 vs DALL-E Product Launches 21:24 - Advice for New DALL-E Users 24:35 - Final Thoughts on DALL-E 2 Announcement 26:00 - DALL-E 2 Commercialization Thoughts, Economic Empowerment 31:10 - GPT-X, DALL-E, and our Multimodal Future Part II 33:35 - Y Combinator for DALL-E 2 Artists 34:30 - Bakz T. Future Season 2 37:10 - Closing Thoughts

entry.title: #35 - How to Become a Successful DALL-E 2 Artist with Lapine DeLaTerre

media:group.media:title: #35 - How to Become a Successful DALL-E 2 Artist with Lapine DeLaTerre
media:group.media:description:
Welcome back to Multimodal! This episode, we have special guest Lapine DeLaTerre joining us. We discuss a variety of topics - how to write DALL-E 2 prompts, learned more about her art, talked about DALL-E 2 pricing, how inpainting works, and how to become a successful DALL-E 2 artist.
Timestamps: 00:00 - Pre-show 00:48 - Intro and Guest Introduction 04:10 - When did you first hear about DALL-E? 08:33 - Did you ever try GPT-3? 10:20 - Did you ever try other image generation AI models? 13:34 - What was it like using DALL-E 2 for the first time? 15:20 - Lapine's 7 hour prompt 18:30 - DALL-E 2 Users Have Individual Artistic Styles 22:10 - What was your first DALL-E 2 prompt? 24:37 - Where do you think individual DALL-E 2 art styles come from? 32:40 - DALL-E 2 & Human Curiosity 35:11 - "The Rabbit Mirror Ritual" 40:00 - Lapine's IRL Painting of Her DALL-E 2 Art 41:44 - What were the lessons learned from painting AI Generated art? 44:27 - DALL-E Pricing Discussion Part I 51:48 - Lapine's DALL-E Art Discussion 55:10 - Discussing r/notdalle2 57:02 - DALL-E Pricing Discussion Part II 01:03:49 - DALL-E 2 Inpainting Advanced Techniques 01:12:24 - What makes a good DALL-E 2 prompt? 01:15:40 - What is the essence of a great DALL-E prompt? 01:26:17 - How Lapine's personal life experiences impact her DALL-E 2 Art 01:36:11 - How do you come up with creative DALL-E 2 prompts on the fly? 01:45:25 - GPT-3 x DALL-E 01:59:28 - How do you practice as an artist for DALL-E 2? 01:54:50 - How would you describe your artistic process? 01:58:48 - Promoting Your DALL-E 2 Art on Social Media 02:06:10 - How do you become a successful DALL-E 2 artist? 02:12:43 - What advice would you give to new DALL-E 2 users? 02:18:03 - Closing thoughts 02:22:40 - Outro
Follow Lapine: https://twitter.com/LapineDeLaTerre
Show Notes/Links: DALL-E 2 Announcement and waitlist: https://openai.com/dall-e-2/ https://labs.openai.com/waitlist
DALL-E Images, people, and links referenced: https://twitter.com/LapineDeLaTerre/status/1521740625367887873 https://twitter.com/djbaskin_images/status/1524093774284029952 https://twitter.com/dbonneville/status/1542590198986543104 https://twitter.com/1SleeplessDoc/status/1524441372970921984 https://twitter.com/PaulYacoubian/status/1530947058735128578 https://twitter.com/bakztfuture/status/1530419340595679233 https://twitter.com/LapineDeLaTerre/status/1536418694280060928 https://twitter.com/djbaskin_images/status/1536156787329495040 https://twitter.com/LapineDeLaTerre/status/1533866922202128384 https://twitter.com/LapineDeLaTerre/status/1534410771400114177 https://twitter.com/LapineDeLaTerre/status/1534089517241466880 https://twitter.com/bakztfuture/status/1542269859337146368 https://twitter.com/LapineDeLaTerre/status/1522409493945995265 https://twitter.com/dbonneville https://www.reddit.com/r/NotDALLE2/ https://twitter.com/LapineDeLaTerre/status/1541089251076345856 https://twitter.com/LapineDeLaTerre/status/1512657629885177859 https://twitter.com/LapineDeLaTerre/status/1525259316864745472 https://www.tiktok.com/@michaelcarychao?lang=en https://twitter.com/cench/status/1517914691535872001

entry.title: Why The Cerebras CS-2 Machine is a Big Deal

media:group.media:title: Why The Cerebras CS-2 Machine is a Big Deal
media:group.media:description:
In my first video talking about AI Hardware on this channel, I talk in detail about an exciting Cerebras CS-2 announcement!
Relevant links: https://venturebeat.com/2022/06/22/cerebras-systems-sets-record-for-largest-ai-models-ever-trained-on-one-device/ https://www.cerebras.net/blog/training-multi-billion-parameter-models-on-a-single-cerebras-system-is-easy https://www.cerebras.net/get-demo/ https://www.cerebras.net/join-us/
Try CS-2: https://cirrascale.com/cerebras.php
Scaling law papers: Scaling Laws for Neural Language Models https://arxiv.org/abs/2001.08361 Language Models are Few-Shot Learners https://arxiv.org/abs/2005.14165 Scaling Laws for Autoregressive Generative Modeling https://arxiv.org/abs/2010.14701

entry.title: #33 - Google Imagen, Deepmind Gato, DALL-E 2 Discord, and a Major Announcement!

media:group.media:description:
Welcome back to Multimodal! This episode we are exploring the latest developments in the multimodal AI space, I'll also be sharing a very big announcement!

entry.title: Generating Images From Reddit r/pics with DALL-E 2

media:group.media:title: Generating Images From Reddit r/pics with DALL-E 2
media:group.media:description:
Can we generate images based on post titles from reddit r/pics using OpenAI's DALL-E 2? In today's video we're going to find out!
preview the images used in this video here: https://twitter.com/bakztfuture/status/1527517441852551170
